features: ♻️【Projector Built in Battery Powered - Up to 1-1.5 hrs】The rechargeable projector with 3000mAh battery operated, You can easily finish 1-2 episodes of TV dramas without worrying; and it also comes with a DC cable to ensure you can always continue to use it without being interrupted. It's a perfect bedroom projector, and also a totally wireless outdoor projector.

❤️【Native 1080P Projector Full HD - Small but Powerful】110B Projector with 1080P native resolution, impressive 9000L bright-ness( within DC Power Mode), and 10000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio providing a sharper, brighter, and richer visual feast, the BIGASUO video projector is an excellent device that allows you to watch HD movies. (Portable Projector with Tripod)

🔊【Compact Projector with Bluetooth & HiFi Stereo Speakers】①The small movie hd projector has built-in dual speakers that restore every detail sound effect and excellent auditory sense experience; ②and with the latest Bluetooth chip, it means this portable projector allows pair your wireless speaker via Bluetooth to enjoy movies anywhere without having to worry about cables getting tangled or tripping over. (Bluetooth Only support Audio device, Projector can Not CONNECT Phone via Bluetooth).

🔷【200'' Giant Screen & ±15° Keystone Correction & Size as 2 Coke Cans】①This outdoor movie mini projector provides of 35-200inch projection display and, 5-16.4 feet projection distance; ②Keystone correction and focus make setting up and getting the perfect screen position a breeze - It's a great choice for family entertainment, and also a heart-ideal gift on any occasion!

✅【Mini Portable HD Projector & Multimedia Compatibility】BIGASUO hand-size small projector support desktop placement, bracket support, and ceiling installation projection. and the rechargeable battery-powered projector is equipped with HDMI / USB / AV / /Micro SD / 3.5mm headphone jack, compatible with Fire TV Stick, Roku, DVD, Laptop, USB, Computer, Headphone, External Speaker, iPhone, Android Phone, iPad, PS5, etc. (For smartphones, Need extra Type C/lightning to HDMI cable)

What are the exact size of this projector? Size: 4.8 x 2.4 x 5.7 inches, here are some references, pls imagine that, the size of 2 units 12fl.oz Coke cans, or 2.5 adult fists, or almost like 6 or 7 iphones stacked on top of each other. Projector with built-in battery, is that safe? What are the advantages? We have done 10000+ battery tests, so don't worry. We know most people like outdoor activities, backyard or camping movie is a good choice, the built-in battery means power source no worries. With HD image, this tech gadget is more cost-effective. Does not pair with my phone/iphone/computer with Bluetooth? Bluetooth ONLY for audio transfer with audio devices, NOT support video sync with smartphones and computers. The phone, computer, and Alexa cannot connect to the projector Bluetooth. Can I play Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc? Please note that due to HDCP copyright, this projector cannot play videos from Netflix or Amazon Prime via smartphone directly, but you can connect it with Fire TV Stick, Laptop, or PC to enjoy these videos. When playing a video, why is there no sound? NOT support Dolby sound. If there is no sound when playing videos like Netflix, turn off Dolby sound.(Settings > Display & Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > and then turn Dolby Digital Plus OFF)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact projector for travel
reviews.reviewText: I got the chance to try out my nice little travel-sized projector last weekend, and it worked great! I travel with my kids a lot, and they always want to have a movie night. This projector is small enough to fit in my travel backpack and use on trips.The tripod that comes with the projector is great, and provides for easy setup. Also, the keystone adjustment is super helpful for easy/fast setup.I was able to easily connect the projector to my external Bluetooth speaker. There is audio built into the projector itself, but you will find that by connecting an external Bluetooth speaker, you will get much better sound quality for viewing movies. It's easily configurable in the settings menu.As with any small projector at this price-point, you'll need to have a very dark room (or outside at nighttime). Using a projector screen also provides a better image vs. a white wall or a bed sheet.This projector has an on/off button at the top, and then a separate on/off switch on the back. I mention this because for travel purposes, the manual switch is great for keeping the projector in off mode while in a suitcase or backpack so that it does not accidently turn on.I found the image quality to be good enough for a quick/easy movie setup. Obviously there are projectors that produce better images and 4K quality, but they cost a lot of money and I wouldn't let my kids use an expensive projector. To me this projector his the sweet-spot between value and image quality that I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive mini battery operated projector
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on Black Friday 2023 for an amazing price. All the reviews at that time were for the larger non battery operated model which is why I am reviewing this smaller version. I figured for the prices it would not live up to the hype. But it's excellent. I think it really is native 1080p. It also down converts 4k nicely. Great picture, will run for a while on battery (not for an entire movie) and I did not notice any change in brightness of picture quality on battery, remote is nice and lots of ports in the back. The size is slightly larger than it looks in the factory picture with the hand but it is very portable.Feels high quality. Even then packaging is great.Also comes with a nice mini tripod and high speed HDMI cable. I have not played with any settings yet as the picture was great out of the box. I will update my review after I use it more.Downsides: for a projector in this price range there really aren't any. But if I had to pick a couple one would be the keystone correction is manual and only a few degrees of correction, but you also don't lose any resolution like the digital ones. It would be nice if they put a bigger battery in it but at this prices point it is amazing it's 1080p and has any battery.Note: The picture example is without changing any default picture settings in a fairly dark room. The picture can get much brighter but not bright enough for a bright room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beats the heck out of my old opaque projector!
reviews.reviewText: Until this purchase I was using an Artograph wall projector for my drawing layouts. It was large and cumbersome and difficult to set in place and use, as I was always need to be contorted on the floor with the paper taped up against a wall. Before LED bulbs, the heat of the old ones would cause the reference picture to warp and wrinkle and shifting about the image being projected on the wall. Totally drove me nuts! But with this new digital projector, I can mount it on my old tripod and pretty much place it atop the table and project the image right down on the paper. And what's best is that I can use any reference image I find on the laptop simply by attaching the provided HDMI cable. Although it doesn't work on my older Toshiba Satellite laptop, I have no issues at all with my Acer Nitro (it did, however, take me a few minutes to figure out that I needed to hit the input selector switch to toggle viewing options for laptop). Great product at a reasonable price. I just hope it lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, low noise level, high resolution.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my bedroom. I have a Xgimi projector for living room, but it’s really inconvenient to keep taking it and setup if I need it in another room. So I decide to get a small one that’s easily to carry. The brightness is high, so I could watch shows with my bedroom light on. Also the noise level was in an acceptable range. I fell in to sleep with the projector on. (The timer turned off the projector itself after 3 hours) I would get one for my mom as a gift. Love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use to works well
reviews.reviewText: I have always wanted a projector and finally decided to buy one. This one works pretty well and is easy to use. I like to just put it on when I want to watch something in bed like youtube or movie since my monitor is small and I have no TV. The output display is also pretty clear as long as you properly adjust the magnifiers. I also recently bought a Nintendo Switch, so I'm hoping I can start to bring the projector switch around to use with that. I would say this is worthy of purchasing since its portable, small and simple to use. Just plug in the device and switch to that input device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars HEED THE LOWER REVIEWS
reviews.reviewText: Please listen when I say, these lower reviews are more correct than the higher ones.I received this projector, the smaller green one. With this product, I could not get it past the start screen, and then while waiting at one point, it made a pop noise and wouldn't turn on again.I read all the low reviews, then looked at the higher reviews. I thought, "well, I've never had an issue with something on Amazon and this is a good deal." To my surprise a couple days later it was not a good deal. I had to return it a day after I bought it because it was defective.So please save your money and time and do a little searching online and buy another projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I did a bit of research on projectors looking at known brands like the Anker Nebula series and lesser/uknown brands like this.Turns out, there's actually not a lot of difference, statistically speaking, as a lot of the components used in them are the same, the lifetime of the lamps are roughly the same but you can get a higher quality image at less than half the cost of same spec projectors from the Nebula series. So I settled on this BIGASUO model in part because of the huge voucher discount too.I was a bit nervous last night after taking the plunge, however, I have been pleasantly surprised!It was incredibly simple to set up out the box, the manual is basically a flyer and may as well be considered plug and play.The image quality is amazing! I honestly am shocked. It truly is 1080p, the image is crisp all the way up to the edges and the colours are perfect. The video you can see is about 50" but having tested it against my bookcases - it's just as good when you project all the way up to 100".Finally, I wasn't actually aware that this had an internal speaker when I bought it, and when I read it on the box I wasn't expecting much... but this is amazing. It is hands down better sound quality than my portable speaker which cost almost as much as the projector itself!I'm over the moon with this projector. Always thought you had to pay an arm and a leg for good quality but this has proven me wrong.Things to note:- I bought some "S hooks" for the 100" screen for when I use this outside in the summer. This will allow me to hook it up to my clothes line/ gazebo - whatever.- If you truly want the cinema experience, I would recommend buying some speakers for directional sound. While the sound quality is good - it's pretty obvious it's only coming from behind you where the projector is and it could do with a bit more bass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking to buy a projector for weeks now and having researched nearly every affordable projector on Amazon and other sites, I decided this projector offered all that I was looking for. The added bonus was the DVD player which I didn’t even think of, but as a family we love watching old movies so this is a fantastic extra.I only today received the projector and I can honestly say I am delighted with my purchase. I have played the DVD which and also plugged in Now TV fire stick and have Netflix set up and running.The picture quality is excellent. I tested the projector to make sure it was working on my patio door curtains which are wrinkled but even at that I felt I was sitting in the cinema watching a movie. The fan you can hear only if you are sitting right beside it, but once you move away the sound is drowned out by the movie itself and this really is not a problem. This would be something that would put me off purchasing any projector, but the fan is fine. The sound quality is very good and you can add a sound bar if needed. If you love to watch movies on a big screen while not breaking the bank - this is really a fantastic option.I have yet to connect the blue tooth but give me a few days and I will have figured out the full potential of this projector. It is not hard to set up - good manual and remote control. It’s bright and crisp and if you go to menu and set it up as per instructions in the manual - you will enjoy a clear bright picture quality. I bought this to watch movies outside which I can’t wait to do over the weekend.The free screen is made of material which the kids can use, but I will try my garden wall first and then decide whether to get a large out door screen. This projector is so versatile- you can flip it to play movies on the ceiling. It has fixtures for a tripod so what more could you want. I know we will enjoy this projector and my friend now wants to buy one.It is small and compact and comes with three plugs for different countries if you want to take this on holiday. It would be nice if it came with a carry bag but this would only add to it’s appeal and would be an added bonus.I give this 5 stars - great little projector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Extremely easy to set up! The video I posted along with this review, shows a movie played via a firestick.. basically plug in and go.I haven't really explored the different settings yet, so this is just on the basic settings. The picture quality is far better in the flesh than what is depicted on my video.I also used this for a Halloween projection, and it proved really popular.The sound quality is also great. On my video, the sound is at half. You can hear the fan whilst the projector is running, but it really is bearable and doesn't affect viewing pleasure.This projector has been given 5 star approval from every member of my family, we're all extremely impressed by all its features and quality!The 100" screen that comes with the projector can also be seen on my video, it is of nice quality. The 12 eyelets are all secure, although I have only used 4 of them to temporarily hang the screen.So portable, versatile, & easy to use.. within minutes, a quiet drink on a Friday night, suddenly became a Top Gun movie night in the conservatory, & we plan to move our movie nights outdoors once the summer returns again.We thoroughly love our latest purchase, and highly recommend this one if you're thinking of getting one, genuinely cannot fault it at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: It's a bargain and it's region free.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several projectors in the past weeks and all have performed exactly as described ,this one has the advantage of a DVD player combined and this makes it truly portable and although not advertised as being so it is all region so another plus.As for the performance it's standard definition the picture is very bright and sharp and you can adjust it to suit the conditions of the room.The sound from the speakers is good but even better from a Bluetooth speaker witch you can connect at the push of a button in the set up procedure easily another plus .The extras included are HDMI and AV leads and a complimentary screen but to get the best performance you need a proper screen .The user manual included is comprehensive and I suggest you read to get the best performance from your projector.So to sum up this is good product with excellent features apart from the included screen and although a bit more expensive than some of the other projectors I have tried this has the advantage of the integral DVD player. I did get it at 25% off however and am glad that I bought it and can recommend it and am looking forward to someone producing anHD blu ray version at a reasonable price.T.E.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Overall good quality for the price, but definitely a budget projector.
reviews.reviewText: I got this projector as I’ve been wanting to dip my toe into the home-cinema experience for a while, but didn’t want to invest a lot of money into it yet.I was very pleased with how it worked and the ease of setting it up - used with AppleTV (HD). Overall very happy with the quality for the price and will consider an upgrade to a more expensive projector having seen this as an entry level model - something quieter and brighter.Pros:Good sharp picture for HD filmsConnection to Bluetooth speaker works wellIncluded screen works well and is a nice feature for the priceCons:Very limited keystone adjustmentNoisy fanOff-centre connection for tripod, makes fixing tricky to stand / tripodNot super-bright, viewing needs to be in a room with no other light source
